summary: Events have parallels in 1931-2. The Lucia bride goes missing. The herring factory majority owner is found dead there. Writer Erica and her cop husband investigate while also preparing for Christmas.
cast: Claudia Galli|Richard Ulfsäter|Eva Fritjofson|Pamela Cortes Bruna|Lennart Jähkel|Ann Westin|Simon Brodén|Lukas Brodén|Ellen Stenman Göransson|Maja Rung|Erik Årman|Ulf Friberg|Sven-Bertil Taube|Ida Engvoll|Christer Fant|Happy Jankell|Oscar Skagerberg|Tintin Anderzon|Julia Sporre|Ylva Lööf|Pia Halvorsen|Nina Gunke|Erik Åkerlind|Måns Ellmark
keywords: winter|church|part of series|based on character from novel|missing girl
title: Los crímenes de Fjällbacka: La maldición de Lucía
